utils

Class Params

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Params
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LightweightParams

    public class Params
extends java.lang.Object
    helper class that allows searching parameters hierarchically by name

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    • Method Detail

      • getInteger

        public java.lang.Integer getInteger(java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        get an Integer object corresponding to the passed argument. It searches the keys it knows for an appearance of , but if it cannot find one, it starts dropping parts of the (separated by a "." character) from left to right, until it finds a match. This match must then be "mappable" to an int, else it throws IllegalArgumentException. If no match can be found, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        name - String
        Returns:
        Integer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
